attributes.action: Prohibit Saudi Arabian Airlines landing rights in the UK until Saudi Arabia respects human rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Saudi Arabia has a terrible record when it comes to political freedoms, the oppression of women, political minorities, homosexuals and religious minorities. Non-Muslims being banned from Mecca simply for their religion.
"Saudi Arabia is a glaring example of religious apartheid," Ali Al-Ahmed, Director of the Saudi Institute, testified to the US congress.
Banning Saudi Arabian airlines may have some effect on the country's domestic opinions.
